TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MergeOption extends System.Enum

summary.span: Specifies how objects being loaded into the object context are merged with objects already in the object context.

span.span: Specifies how objects being loaded into the object context are merged with objects already in the object context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)] mantém apenas uma única instância de um objeto com uma chave de entidade específica no cache.The [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)] only maintains a single instance of an object with a specific entity key in the cache. O objetos são objetos imutáveis que que representam a identidade do objeto.The objects are immutable objects that that represent object's identity. Chaves de entidade são usadas para executar a resolução de identidade no contexto de objeto.Entity keys are used to perform identity resolution in the object context. Para obter mais informações, consulte [trabalhando com chaves de entidade](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fe3f4206-d277-43a1-a72f-4e86fdf12b9f).For more information, see [Working with Entity Keys](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fe3f4206-d277-43a1-a72f-4e86fdf12b9f). Se uma entidade com a mesma identidade já está sendo controlada, os dados provenientes da fonte de dados e os dados já no Gerenciador de estado são mesclados de acordo com o da consulta.If an entity with the same identity is already being tracked, the data coming from the data source and the data already in the state manager are merged according to the of the query.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Objects.MergeOption AppendOnly = int32(0)

summary.span: Objects that do not exist in the object context are attached to the context.

span.span: Objects that do not exist in the object context are attached to the context.

summary.span: If an object is already in the context, the current and original values of object's properties in the entry are not overwritten with data source values.

span.span: If an object is already in the context, the current and original values of object's properties in the entry are not overwritten with data source values.

summary.span: The state of the object's entry and state of properties of the object in the entry do not change.

span.span: The state of the object's entry and state of properties of the object in the entry do not change.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Objects.MergeOption NoTracking = int32(3)

summary.span: Objects are maintained in a state and are not tracked in the .

span.span: Objects are maintained in a state and are not tracked in the .

summary.span: However, [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]-generated entities and POCO entities with proxies maintain a reference to the object context to facilitate loading of related objects.

span.span: However, [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]-generated entities and POCO entities with proxies maintain a reference to the object context to facilitate loading of related objects.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Objects.MergeOption OverwriteChanges = int32(1)

summary.span: Objects that do not exist in the object context are attached to the context.

span.span: Objects that do not exist in the object context are attached to the context.

summary.span: If an object is already in the context, the current and original values of object's properties in the entry are overwritten with data source values.

summary.span: The state of the object's entry is set to , no properties are marked as modified.

span.span: The state of the object's entry is set to , no properties are marked as modified.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Objects.MergeOption PreserveChanges = int32(2)

summary.span: Objects that do not exist in the object context are attached to the context.

span.span: Objects that do not exist in the object context are attached to the context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Se o estado da entidade for , os valores atuais e originais na entrada são substituídos pelos valores de fonte de dados.If the state of the entity is , the current and original values in the entry are overwritten with data source values. O estado do permanece entidade e nenhuma propriedade é marcada como modificada.The state of the entity remains and no properties are marked as modified. Se o estado da entidade for , os valores atuais das propriedades modificadas não são substituídos pelos valores de fonte de dados.If the state of the entity is , the current values of modified properties are not overwritten with data source values. Os valores originais das propriedades não modificados são substituídos com os valores da fonte de dados.The original values of unmodified properties are overwritten with the values from the data source. No [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] versão 4, o [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)] compara os valores atuais das propriedades não modificados com os valores que foram retornados da fonte de dados.In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] version 4, the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)] compares the current values of unmodified properties with the values that were returned from the data source. Se os valores não forem iguais, a propriedade é marcada como modificada.If the values are not the same, the property is marked as modified. No [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] versão 3.5 SP1, o [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)] não marca a propriedade como modificado, mesmo se o valor na fonte de dados é diferente.In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] version 3.5 SP1, the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)] does not mark the property as modified, even if the value in the data source is different. Apenas propriedades modificadas são mantidas para a fonte de dados quando você chama .Only modified properties are persisted to the data source when you call . Para preservar o comportamento de SP1 3.5, defina para `true`.To preserve the 3.5 SP1 behavior, set to `true`. A opção PreserveChanges pode ser usada para resolver as exceções de simultaneidade otimista, preservando alterações no contexto local.The PreserveChanges option can be used to resolve optimistic concurrency exceptions while preserving changes in the local context. Para obter mais informações, consulte [salvando as alterações e gerenciando a simultaneidade](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8378601-4f26-4a05-a24a-f50aeb68610e).For more information, see [Saving Changes and Managing Concurrency](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8378601-4f26-4a05-a24a-f50aeb68610e).
